alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:22AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Craven and Carteret Counties through 400 AM EDT... At 322 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine Knoll Shores, or near Morehead City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Harkers Island, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Marshallberg, Davis, Smyrna, Merrimon, Straits, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Otway, Broad Creek, Great Neck, Wildwood, Williston and Peletier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret
